content: ve gone around the left needle work an ssk into the 2 closed hole once or twice stitches you just slipped 56 sts 6 once it feels secure cut the yarn round 8 * k2 p2 3x k2 repeat from * 7 weave in your co tail if you have a around folded brim weave the tail in the rs of round 9 *k2tog p2 k2 p2 2x ssk the fabric since the ws will be showing repeat from * around 48 sts when folded switch to longer cord length needles for magic loop or dpns when your stitches start to feel stretched 2
